content: crochet this cute octopus amigurumi sea animal with the diy fluffies no-sew crochet pattern and video tutorial this pattern is available for free in english and dutch when you make this mini octopus keychain size with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be 7 cm / 3 inch you can make it bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook the bigger plush octopus was made with chenille super bulky yarn size 13 cm / 6 inch english written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-octopus-crochet-pattern/ dutch written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-octopus-knuffel-haakpatroon/ english video https //youtu be/hug9thiydhc dutch nederlands video soon
